skillTree.localised_description: For the gaudier Warlord, Clan Moulder offers their most bloated Pox Rats as mounts to flail, crush, and savage a way through the enemy’s ranks.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This is a unit created by Clan Moulder. Packmasters and Throt the Unclean can push it to its full combat potential and restore it in battle.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: As soon as the Packmaster unleashes his beloved 'pets' upon the battlefield, their bloodthirsty hunt begins!

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "Tide of Death"

skillTree.localised_description: Summoned forth from filth-ridden sewers, disease-carrying amalgamations of rat and wolf cause pestilent havoc in the enemy’s ranks.

skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: A things-catcher and whip are not all that makes a Packmaster, for only the best have monster-goading down to a fine art.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units
	(Hero's army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units
	(own local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Moulder’s most elite Packmasters are known as Master Moulders, fearless wranglers who excel at instilling greater control and discipline into their packs.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units
	(Hero's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +5% for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror and Hell Pit Abomination units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Show a Packmaster a hero and he will show you a tragedy.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Hero action cost: -10% for all actions
Wound action: Additional 20% chance of wounding target
Hero action cost: -20% for all actions

skillTree.localised_description: Catching lesser foes is hardly a challenge, but is undeniably useful to provide extra rations for the pack.

Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -5%
	(enemy armies in province)
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: This rat has been sprayed by some of the most horrible creatures ever to exist, and the very air around him intimidates enemy beasts.

skillTree.localised_description: Which do you fear more, the vicious monstrosities, or the rat that commands their respect and obedience?

skillTree.localised_description: Ah, spleen of rat ogre very rare-valuable, and difficult to extract! Will bargain-trade for warpstone.

effects.description:
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +2%
	(accompanying Lord)

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +4%
	(accompanying Lord)

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +8%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.
This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Even the most vicious and impetuous monstrosities can be 'encouraged' to do one’s bidding with a quick jolt of Warpstone-generated electricity.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance from battle: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance from battle: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance from battle: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: We all must fight, no matter our station.
I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!
We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +4%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "I keep them sharp, yes-yes. Always ready for the challenge that I know is coming, yes-yes!"
"When they come for you, go straight for the throat and tear it clean out. They won't come again."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +50% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Most precious of all substances, the pulse of our life."

	(all units in army)

	(all units in army)

Construction cost: -10% for Engineering buildings
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +25%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

	(all units in army)
